dcterms:description: CASME II is an improved version of CASME collected in a well-controlled lab environment. It contains 247 micro-expressions from 35 subjects, labeled based on Action Units (AUs), participants' self-reports, and the content of the stimuli video. The dataset suffers from severe class imbalance with micro-expressions defined in 7 classes.
dcterms:title: CASME II
